name: Seven: Drowned Past
storyline: This time Teriel, ran into 'The Enclave’, a ragtag group of mysterious vagabonds who have discovered the mythological sunken vessel and are exploring it in the hopes of unearthing riches. But things that are buried for a good reason, as you're about to discover.
summary: Seven: Drowned Past introduces a whole new story line, including: additional opponents, new skills to implement, terrains to parkour, eight new quests, and about 7 hours of gameplay, all for free to owners of Seven: The Days Long Gone.
